name: New City (Nico)
description:
You are a nomad... 

You find a new place... you like this place... you like the feeling of the city... then... 

You have to use that energy you can feel in your body for put yourself in this new world, but people here don't trust nomad.

You will notice that you have a duck that follow your steps... just look around when walk to see it.

Use [a,w,s,d] or arrow keys to walk, click with mouse on the option to select. Just talk with people. 

Average time to complete: few minutes...

HINT: talk with Marge after helping...

the browser version game screen can take some extra time to load the first time...
